body: Hi all, I happened to find this fantastic cumulative solar radiation analysis done by Yazdani Studio of CannonDesign. I am wondering how this can be done in Grasshopper. Can anyone share personal experience? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KewsNm4bWJ4xPLltQaK3CWW9efI0gFozX4oHgbBvh*c8Ysdylab9e7gneV14ScnA5uFlspdb5uKCU72HrMjGlnllAWGeVHrG/Cumulativesolarradiationanalysis.jpg) Thanks in advance!
